Our dual approach to learning ensures that employees and construction professionals receive top-notch training, enhancing their capabilities and contributing to the organization's long-term success. Ltd plays a pivotal role in driving the company's excellence by nurturing a skilled and future-ready workforce. Explore our programs to discover how we can help you elevate your career and contribute to the continued success of the Organization. BCA ATTC Ley Choon is a BCA Approved Training and Testing Centre (ATTC) incorporated in May 2011. We provide training and tests (skills assessments) for construction workers as a platform to equip them with the knowledge and practical skills to operate the hydraulic excavator and bulldozer machines. Our experienced trainers are always on hand to address the needs of each and every candidate. With patience and dedication, they will help candidates meet the objectives to achieve good results. Skills Evaluation Certificate (SEC / SEC(K)) The Skills Evaluation Certificate (Knowledge), or SEC(K), aims to raise skills, productivity, and safety standards in the construction industry. It is one of the most direct routes for upgrading to Higher-Skilled (R1) status under MOM's levy scheme. 3. This program is conducted by Ley Choon Construction & Engineering Pte Ltd BCA Approved Training and Testing Centre. Key Learning Outcomes PS1 Distinguish the various hydraulic excavator models commonly employed in the construction sector. PS2 Recognize the key elements comprising a hydraulic excavator. PS3 Describe the purposes of safety mechanisms and indicators installed on the hydraulic excavator. PS4 Execute the prescribed manual signals and communication methods for operating a hydraulic excavator. PS5 Adhere to proper operational protocols and safety measures. PS6 Analyze Lifting Plans and undertake necessary preparations before engaging in lifting activities. PS7 Review the load indicator monitor and understand warning signs for effective interpretation. View Course Fees & Registration Bulldozer Operation The Bulldozer Operation course aims to equip trainees with the knowledge and skills required to meet the standards required of the test level. Course Content General knowledge of the bulldozer Daily inspection and weekly maintenance of the bulldozer Pre-start and shut-down procedures Manoeuvre and park the plant through the bulldozer test circuit Mark out the boundary of the trench according to the drawing Good practices for backfilling, travelling and loading excavated materials onto vehicles Post operation procedure View Course Fees & Registration Construction Plant Operation (non-lifting) CET Online We are one of the ATTC providing online CET training for Construction Plant Operation (non-lifting). In order to continuously upgrade the construction workforce to support improvements in productivity, quality and safety, all CoreTrade personnel are required to attend CET courses under their respective registered trade category for CoreTrade renewal. Course Overview The CET in Construction Plant Operation Training (non-lifting) is a half-day course covering: Latest codes and regulations Good practices in non-lifting operation New technology in non-lifting machines New hazards in non-lifting operation Latest case studies of lifting accidents Course Fee $110.00 (Exclude GST) For queries on application, please contact: üìû 6705 5290 / 9749 7241 üìß training@leychoon.com Ley Choon Training Courses Our Learning & Development (L&D) team curates a range of targeted Training programs. These programs cater to both upskilling and reskilling, ensuring that employees stay competitive and adaptable in an ever-evolving industry. Whether enhancing existing skills or acquiring new ones, our training programs prioritize workforce development to foster personal growth, operational efficiency, and innovation. This holistic approach allows us to build a robust talent pipeline while preparing the workforce to meet future business demands. Essential Road Maintenance Training Program This program is conducted by Ley Choon Construction & Engineering Pte Ltd. The Essential Road Maintenance Training Program is designed to equip participants with comprehensive knowledge and practical skills essential for executing road maintenance works safely and efficiently. This program blends theoretical instruction with hands-on practice to prepare participants for real-world challenges in road construction and maintenance. Learning Outcomes LO1 Comply with LTA Code of Practice for Traffic Control at Work Zones and WSH regulations during road maintenance operations. LO2 Apply road safety protocols and correctly use Personal Protective Equipment (PPE) to ensure a safe work environment. LO3 Interpret Traffic Control Plans (TCPs) and implement traffic control measures in compliance with approved procedures. LO4 Perform pavement maintenance tasks, including defects identification, patching, and resurfacing. LO5 Operate and maintain road maintenance machinery and equipment safely. LO6 Apply excavation safety measures and soil stabilization techniques to prevent trench collapse. Course Fee Contact for pricing *Additional Course Training Requests: $200 (Exclude GST) per day.
